subtitle: In this exotic dish the combination of the marinated pork gives an exciting and delicious flavour.

method.text: Thinly slice the pork. De-seed peppers and cut into matchsticks
Mix marinade ingredients together. Add pork to marinade and mix well. Cover and chill for about 1 days.
Heat oil in large frying pan, add pork and marinade and cook for about 5 min. Stir in mushrooms and cook for 1 min. Lift out pork and mushrooms.
Reduce liquor by half by boiling rapidly. Cool.
Mix remaining ingredients together in large salad bowl. Add pork and mushrooms. Pour on the cooled liquor and toss together.

title: Thai pork and mushroom salad
